content.text: wow that's really cool! I'm actually a baker but I do love to bank.
what's your favorite thing about baking?
I love the smell of fresh bread and I love to be creative with my recipes. I like to bake mystery themed cakes.
that's really cool! I love the smell of fresh bread too, but I'm not so good at baking.
oh man that's too bad! baking is a really fun hobby.
yeah I'm more of a free spirit. I like to go with the flow and just have fun.
I can dig that! I like to be active and I love to go hiking and camping.
that's so cool! I love hiking but I'm not so big on camping. I prefer to be in a hotel or something.
oh man I love the outdoors. I love being in nature and away from the hustle and bustle of city life.
I can understand that. I live in a big city and sometimes it feels like it's too much.
yeah it can be a lot. I love that I can just go for a hike and be in the middle of nowhere.
that's really awesome! I'm glad you enjoy it.
yeah I love it! it's so peaceful and relaxing.
